website_summaries.verdict: The large, sharp screen of the 9.7-inch Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 is great for watching media and playing games at home or on the road.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 9.7 has bright and vividly colorful screen
Its rail-thin design is comfortable and ultracompact
It comes with 32GB of storage, a microSD card expansion slot and fingerprint scanner
cons: Unlike previous models, there's no IR blaster
In smaller hands, it's not as easy to use as the 8-inch model
